plot: Frank was just trying to turn it up a notch with his girlfriend when things went bad and it turned into a hard day...a really hard day.
title: A Hard Day
plot_es: Frank was just trying to turn it up a notch with his girlfriend when things went bad and it turned into a hard day...a really hard day.
plot_en: Frank was just trying to turn it up a notch with his girlfriend when things went bad and it turned into a hard day...a really hard day.
